description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Diary of D. H., a Private in Colonel P. Dudley Sargent's Regiment of the Massachusetts Line, in the army of the American Revolution. From the original manuscript. With a biographical sketch of the author by G. W. Chase, and illustrative notes by H. B. Dawson. (D. H.'s second Diary.) L.P" Author: HOW, David. Contributor: CHASE, George Wingate. Contributor: Dawson, Henry B. (Henry Barton) Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9602.i.2." Page: 8 Place of Publishing: Morrisania Date of Publishing: 1865 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001745531 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
